Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2013 01:04PM BZO63 wrote: hello, I finished the same chemotherapy December 28th. One of my friends who has gone trough this ordeal told me to use Meta NX( a strong folic acid and b complex) to prevent neuropathy with TAxol. I started 1 week before taxol twice a day and used all during the course. I did not get neuropathy
